message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item to you for $95. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit to $90.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $85 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on the price. How about we meet in the middle at $87? This is my final offer.
